flawed_nl_solution:
A third of $30 is $30*(1/3) = $<<30*1/3=90/1>>90/1
She spent $90/1 from $30 leaving $30-$90/1 = $-60
She spent another $8 leaving $-60-$8 = $<<-60-8=-68>>-68 which she saved

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 90/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
